name: Recycle Or Else!
description:
Uh-oh! Humanity messed up BIG TIME!

In Recycle Or Else! you play as a faithful human recycle worker and must sort the trash correctly.

Will your efforts be enough to save the planet? 

Use the left and right arrows to push the incoming waste into the correct container!

This game was developed for the IGA Impact Jam 2022.

Themes: "Positive Impact" + "Neon"
